discussionText: I'm feeling so anxious today. I just want to run away from everything :(

comments.commentText: I get that way too sometimes, I know how you feel. Remember to keep breathing, and take space if you need it.

discussionText: When I'm stressed out I like to sit outside and listen to the birds. What are some tricks you guys use?

comments.commentText: My favorite trick is listening to music, its amazing how much it can help!
